title: Paula Badosa Defends Herself After Injury Withdrawal
summary: Paula Badosa is a tennis player from Spain who was once ranked number two in the world. She had to stop playing a match in Dubai because her leg hurt. Some people on social media said she was being disrespectful to tennis by withdrawing. Badosa replied that she has a long-term injury and tries hard every day to play, even when it's painful. She loves tennis and always wants to keep going if she can. She also talked about how mean comments online can hurt players' feelings. Badosa has thought about quitting tennis because of her injuries but still fights to play.
